thread.title: Here are the best memes of Carmelo Anthony’s winter outfit
thread.title_full: Here are the best memes of Carmelo Anthony’s winter outfit

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Here are the best memes of Carmelo Anthony’s winter outfit
text:
MELO X MIGOS.
There was a winter storm in New York on Monday but the New York Knicks played on. After defeating the Indiana Pacers at Madison Square Garden, Carmelo Anthony stepped out in his best winter wear.
Naturally, we took the picture and put it everywhere we could. Like Hoth for starters.
And then on the Bachelor. Melo knows how awkward that finale was.
MELO X MIGOS
Insert “the Knicks are ice cold” joke here.
Now Melo’s watch begins.
[Looks at Knicks]
The Knicks did win on Tuesday, for what it’s worth.
